metadata.title: CVE-2017-12444 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: The mdjvu_bitmap_get_bounding_box function in base/4bitmap.c in minidjvu0.8 can cause a denial of service (invalid memory read and applicationcrash) via a crafted djvu file.

criterions.comment: minidjvu: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
